    • find_order

      public static Order find_order​(int filterBy, String key)
      Find and return order with specific id/customer name/table id
      Parameters:
      filterBy - 0 - all (calls view_order) 1 - by id 2 - by customer name 3 - by table number
      key - key to be searched

    • update_order

      public static int update_order​(int order_id, Item item, boolean option)
      Update an existing order i.e. add / remove an **a la carte **item, from order with specified order id Also maintains the price of an order.
      Parameters:
      order_id -
      item -
      option - true - add an item false - remove an item (decrease item.quantity by 1. If an item's quantity would become 0, it gets removed.

    • update_order_set

      public static int update_order_set​(int order_id, ItemSet item, boolean option)
      Update an existing order i.e. add / remove an **set**, from order with specified order id
      Parameters:
      order_id -
      item -
      option - true - add an item false - remove an item (decrease item.quantity by 1. If an item's quantity would become 0, it gets removed.

    • checkIsOpenOrder

      public static boolean checkIsOpenOrder​(String id)
      Function to check if an order with specified order id exists and is open.
      Parameters:
      id - order id of query
      Returns:

    • print_invoice

      public static void print_invoice​(Order order)
      Prepare all the information for printing invoice for an existing order selected from user by specified order id The final printing job is done at OrderUI by passing all he necessary data to OrderUI.print_invoice_details(key,content)
      Parameters:
      order - Selected order object from user
